steps.title: Draw a circle near the left topmost area of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a circle near the left topmost area of the paper.

steps.title: Draw a horizontal oval near the southeast area of the circle .
steps.content: Draw a horizontal oval near the southeast area of the circle .

steps.title: Draw a spade-shaped curve below the circle.
steps.content: Draw a spade-shaped curve below the circle. This serves as Twilight Sparkle's snout. Connect this with two curved lines to the oval, serving as her neck. Draw also shapes above the circle for her ear and unicorn horn.

steps.title: Draw the outline for Twilight Sparkle's front legs.
steps.content: Draw the outline for Twilight Sparkle's front legs.

steps.title: Draw the outline for Twilight Sparkle hind legs.
steps.content: Draw the outline for Twilight Sparkle hind legs.

steps.title: Draw facial guide lines.
steps.content: Draw facial guide lines. This is a vertical line with two horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of two-beamed cross. This will help in placing Twilight Sparkle's eyes.

steps.title: Draw Twilight Sparkle's hair fringes (bangs).
steps.content: Draw Twilight Sparkle's hair fringes (bangs). Note that her unicorn horn would be protruding from her forehead and going through the center of her hair fringes.

steps.title: Use the facial line guides to start drawing Twilight Sparkle's eyes, snout and mouth.
steps.content: Use the facial line guides to start drawing Twilight Sparkle's eyes, snout and mouth.

steps.title: Complete Twilight Sparkle's brushed mane.
steps.content: Complete Twilight Sparkle's brushed mane.

steps.title: Trace Twilight Sparkle's body.
steps.content: Trace Twilight Sparkle's body. Draw her long brushed tail.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.

steps.title: Draw a large circle for her head, near the topmost and center of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a large circle for her head, near the topmost and center of the paper.

steps.title: Add a spade-shape under the circle, to serve as her chin and jaw.
steps.content: Add a spade-shape under the circle, to serve as her chin and jaw. Trace a vertical line to the very center of both these shapes, then add two parallel horizontal lines that will intersect this vertical line (forming some sort of a cross). These lines will serve as a guide where the facial features will be placed.

steps.title: Draw a quadrilateral polygon as her body near and below her head.
steps.content: Draw a quadrilateral polygon as her body near and below her head. Beneath it, attach an inverted pentagon to serve as her hips.

steps.title: Connect the head to the torso.
steps.content: Connect the head to the torso. Do this with a pair of lines to serve as her neck. Draw curved pipes and ovals as guide for her arms and hands.

steps.title: Draw her legs directly below the pentagon.
steps.content: Draw her legs directly below the pentagon.

steps.title: Draw facial features.
steps.content: Draw facial features. Using the facial guide lines, draw her eyes, eyebrow and mouth.

steps.title: Draw her hair and fringes (bangs).
steps.content: Draw her hair and fringes (bangs). Also, start tracing her hands and upper part of her uniform.

steps.title: Start tracing the rest of her body and the details of her uniform.
steps.content: Start tracing the rest of her body and the details of her uniform.

steps.title: Complete her hair that would be reaching to her knee level.
steps.content: Complete her hair that would be reaching to her knee level.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired. Note: her hair is purple, and at the center is a line with pink and violet combination.
